title: Social Constructivist-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Solid Operations

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Necessity of establishing smartphone-based collaborative learning environments for pre-service teachers

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to design collaborative learning activities for solving solid particle size distribution calculation problems
Establishing discussion facilitation strategies based on social constructivism in online real-time environments

Learners will develop two formative assessment materials related to math concepts (e.g., calculus, statistics) using Google Forms and Padlet within a week, achieving ‘excellent’ ratings in at least two of three peer evaluation rubric items (question clarity, interactivity, feedback utility).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
